TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public MustInherit Class FileDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FileDialog abstract : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

summary.span: 显示一个用户可从中选择文件的对话框窗口。

span.span: Displays a dialog box from which the user can select a file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是包含 和 类的常见行为的抽象类。 is an abstract class that contains common behavior for the and classes. 它不应直接使用，但包含这两个类的常见行为。It is not intended to be used directly but contains common behavior for those two classes. 不能创建 的实例。You cannot create an instance of . 尽管类是公开的，但您不能从它继承，因为它包含内部抽象方法。Although the class is declared public, you cannot inherit from it, as it contains internal abstract methods. 若要创建对话框以选择或保存文件，请使用 或 。To create a dialog box to select or save a file, use or . 是模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它会阻止应用程序的其余部分，直到用户选择了文件。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a file. 当对话框模式显示时，除了对话框上的对象之外，不会出现任何输入（键盘或鼠标单击）。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 在输入调用程序之前，程序必须隐藏或关闭对话框（通常是为了响应某些用户操作）。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. > [!CAUTION] > 当使用派生自 的类（如 和 ）时，请避免使用包含绝对路径的字符串。When you use classes derived from , such as and , avoid using string literals containing absolute paths. 相反，请使用下表中所述的一种或多种方法动态获取路径。Instead, dynamically obtain the path using one or more of the techniques described in the following table. 如果要使用户能够选择文件夹而不是文件，请使用 。If you want to enable users to select a folder instead of a file, use the . 根据应用程序的类型、如何存储与应用程序相关联的数据，以及访问文件系统的原因，您可以使用多种方法来创建目录路径。Depending upon the type of application, how data associated with the application is stored, and the reason for accessing the file system, there are many possible ways in which you can create a directory path. 下表显示了用于动态创建路径的方法。The following table shows the techniques for creating paths dynamically. |路径或程序类别Path or program category|要使用的类和成员Class and members to use| |------------------------------|------------------------------| |标准 Windows 路径，如程序文件、MyDocuments、桌面等Standard Windows paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, the Desktop and so on| 类是使用 枚举值之一，通过其静态方法（如 或通过 方法）最完整的源。The class is the most complete source for these, either through its static methods, such as , or through the method, using one of the enumerated values.| |与当前应用程序相关的路径Paths related to the current application| 类具有静态成员，用于获取特定路径，如 、、和 。The class has static members to obtain certain paths, such as , , , and .

的 方法返回临时文件夹的路径。The method of the returns the path of the temporary folder.

类的 方法返回应用程序的当前执行目录。The method of the class returns the application's current executing directory.

类的 属性表示指定驱动器的根目录。The property of the class represents the specified drive's root directory.| |存储为应用程序设置的路径Paths stored as application settings|访问从 派生的包装器类的相应应用程序设置属性。Access the corresponding applications settings property of the wrapper class derived from . 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体的应用程序设置](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms)。For more information, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms).| |注册表存储Registry storage|某些应用程序将目录信息存储在注册表中。Some applications store directory information in the registry. 类具有解析为 值的 和 属性。The class has the and properties that resolve to a value.| |ClickOnce 应用程序ClickOnce applications|对于 ClickOnce 应用程序，请使用 类成员，如 ，这将返回指向 ClickOnce 数据目录的指针。For ClickOnce applications, use class members such as , which will return a pointer to the ClickOnce data directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 ClickOnce 应用程序中访问本地数据和远程数据](/visualstudio/deployment/accessing-local-and-remote-data-in-clickonce-applications)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](/visualstudio/deployment/accessing-local-and-remote-data-in-clickonce-applications).| |国际应用程序International applications|对于国际化应用程序，请使用 类从应用程序中的字符串资源检索相对路径部分。For international applications, retrieve the relative path portion from a string resource in your application by using the class. 有关全球化和本地化的详细信息，请参阅主题[全球化和本地化](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/)。For more information about globalization and localization, see the topic [Globalization and Localization](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/).| 请注意，可以使用一个或多个所述的技术来构建完整的路径。Notice that a full path may be built up using one or more of the described techniques. 例如， 方法可用于获取 MyDocuments 文件夹的路径，则可使用应用程序设置来添加相对子目录部分。For example, the method might be used to obtain the path to the MyDocuments folder, then an application setting may be used to add a relative subdirectory portion. 类包含静态成员，以帮助操作绝对路径和相对路径字符串，而 和 类的静态成员分别操作文件和目录。The class contains static members to assist in manipulating absolute and relative path strings, whereas the and classes have static members that actually manipulate files and directories, respectively. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序的用户更改了 中的文件夹，则你的应用程序的当前工作目录将设置为 中指定的位置。If the user of your application changes the folder in the , then the current working directory for your application is set to the location specified in the . 若要防止出现这种情况，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To prevent this, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 实现，并说明了如何创建、设置属性和显示对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用 方法来显示对话框并返回 。The example uses the method to display the dialog box and return the . 该示例要求在窗体上放置了一个 ，并向其添加了 命名空间。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AddExtension { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AddExtension : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户省略扩展名，对话框是否自动在文件名中添加扩展名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box automatically adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension.

value.span: 当用户省略了扩展名时，如果对话框在文件名中添加扩展名，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the dialog box adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到文件名的扩展名取决于当前选定的文件筛选器和 属性的值。The extension added to a file name depends on the currently selected file filter and the value of the property. 如果 `true` 属性，则对话框将添加当前文件筛选器中与现有文件匹配的第一个扩展。If the property is `true`, the dialog box adds the first extension from the current file filter that matches an existing file. 如果没有文件与当前文件筛选器匹配，则对话框将添加在 属性中指定的扩展。If no files match the current file filter, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property. 如果 `false` 属性，则对话框将从当前文件筛选器添加第一个有效的文件扩展名。If the property is `false`, the dialog box adds the first valid file name extension from the current file filter. 如果当前文件筛选器不包含有效的文件扩展名，则对话框将添加在 属性中指定的扩展。If the current file filter contains no valid file name extensions, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoUpgradeEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 实例在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 上运行时是否应自动升级外观和行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

value.span: 如果此 实例在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 上运行时应自动升级外观和行为，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false`此属性，则 类将在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]上具有 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]样式的外观和行为。If this property is `false`, the class will have a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]-style appearance and behavior on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]. 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]上，此属性不会有任何影响。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]上，此属性不会有任何影响。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `InitializeDialogAndButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultExt : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置默认文件扩展名。

span.span: Gets or sets the default file name extension.

value.span: 默认的文件扩展名。

span.span: The default file name extension.

value.span: 返回的字符串不包含句点。

span.span: The returned string does not include the period.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序的用户指定一个不带扩展名的文件名时， 会将扩展名附加到文件名。When the user of your application specifies a file name without an extension, the appends an extension to the file name. 使用的扩展由 和 属性确定。The extension that is used is determined by the and properties. 如果在 中选择了筛选器，并且筛选器指定了扩展，则使用该扩展。If a filter is selected in the and the filter specifies an extension, then that extension is used. 如果所选筛选器使用通配符代替扩展，则使用 属性中指定的扩展。If the filter selected uses a wildcard in place of the extension, then the extension specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和 方法与流一起使用。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示了如何使用 、、和 成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是一个完整的示例，可以在将其复制到项目时运行。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个包含在文件对话框中选定的文件名的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing the file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 对话框中选择的文件名。

span.span: The file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件名包括文件路径和扩展名。The file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果未选择任何文件，则此方法返回一个空字符串（""）。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty string (""). 当从 类中使用时，此属性表示要保存的文件;当从 类中使用时，它表示正在打开的文件。When used from the class, this property represents the file being saved; when used from the class, it represents the file being opened. 此属性只能是选定文件的名称。This property can only be the name of one selected file. 如果要返回包含多选对话框中所有选定文件的名称的数组，请使用 。If you want to return an array containing the names of all selected files in a multiple-selection dialog box, use . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和 方法与流一起使用。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示了如何使用 、、和 成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是一个完整的示例，可以在将其复制到项目时运行。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileNames As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ FileNames { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对话框中所有选定文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

value.span: 包含对话框中所有选定文件的文件名的 类型数组。

span.span: An array of type , containing the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个文件名同时包含文件路径和扩展名。Each file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果未选择任何文件，则此方法返回一个空数组。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户选择多个图像，并在窗体上 控件中显示这些图像。The following code example allows the user to select a number of images and display them in controls on a Form. 它演示如何初始化 、设置 和 属性，以及允许用户通过将 属性设置为 true 来选择多个文件。It demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 此代码示例假定您的窗体已具有一个名为 `openFileDialog1`的 控件、一个名为 `SelectFileButton` 和一个名为 的 `flowLayoutPanel1`。This code example assumes that your form already has an control named `openFileDialog1`, a named `SelectFileButton`, and a named `flowLayoutPanel1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FileOk As CancelEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击文件对话框中的“打开”或 “保存”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on the **Open** or **Save** button on a file dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，处理 事件并使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the property, handling the event and using the method. 当示例运行时，用户可以从 对象中选择图形文件。When the example runs, a user can select graphics files from an object. 选择的文件将显示在窗体中。The selected files are displayed in the form. 方法强制为打开的每个图形文件重新绘制窗体。The method forces a repaint of the form for each graphics file opened. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `PictureBox1`的 的窗体中，名为 `OpenFileDialog1`，并将名为 。`fileButton`To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `PictureBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, and a named `fileButton`. 从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法调用 `InitializePictureBox` 和 `InitializeOpenFileDialog` 方法。Call the `InitializePictureBox` and `InitializeOpenFileDialog` methods from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 当示例运行时，单击按钮即可显示该对话框。When the example is running, display the dialog box by clicking the button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件名筛选器字符串，该字符串决定对话框的“另存为文件类型”或“文件类型”框中出现的选择内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the current file name filter string, which determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.

value.span: 对话框中可用的文件筛选选项。

span.span: The file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个筛选选项，筛选器字符串都包含筛选器的说明，后跟竖线（|）和筛选器模式。For each filtering option, the filter string contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同筛选选项的字符串用竖线分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是筛选器字符串的示例：The following is an example of a filter string: `Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*` 可以通过用分号分隔文件类型将多个筛选模式添加到筛选器，例如：You can add several filter patterns to a filter by separating the file types with semicolons, for example: `Image Files(*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF)|*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF|All files (*.*)|*.*` 使用 "" 属性可设置首先向用户显示的筛选选项。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 实现，并说明了如何创建、设置属性和显示对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用 "" 和 "" 属性为用户提供筛选器列表。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 该示例要求在窗体上放置了一个 ，并向其添加了 命名空间。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: format is invalid.

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框中当前选定筛选器的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

span.span: A value containing the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "" 属性可设置首先向用户显示的筛选选项。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. 你还可以在显示文件对话框后使用 的值，以根据所选的筛选器执行特殊的文件操作。You can also use the value of after showing the file dialog to perform special file operations depending upon the filter chosen. > [!NOTE] > 第一个筛选器条目的索引值为1。The index value of the first filter entry is 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 实现，并说明了如何创建、设置属性和显示对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 该示例使用 "" 和 "" 属性为用户提供筛选器列表。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 该示例要求在窗体上放置了一个 ，并向其添加了 命名空间。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.
The message received by the dialog box.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: 定义要重写的通用对话框挂钩过程，以便向文件对话框添加特定功能。

span.span: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to the file dialog box.

returns.span: 如果默认对话框过程处理此消息，则返回零；如果默认对话框过程忽略此消息，则返回非零值。

span.span: Returns zero if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; returns a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 挂钩过程允许用户出于调试或增强功能的目的，将其他例程连接或插入到例程或应用程序中。A hook procedure allows the user to connect or insert other routines into a routine or application for the purpose of debugging or enhancing functionality. 默认情况下，挂钩过程在屏幕上将对话框显示为响应 WM_INITDIALOG 消息。By default, the hook procedure centers the dialog box on the screen in response to a WM_INITDIALOG message.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InitialDirectory { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.InitialDirectory : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框显示的初始目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 文件对话框中显示的初始目录。

span.span: The initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用以下源之一设置 属性：The property is typically set using one of the following sources: - 以前在程序中使用的路径，可能会从最后一个目录或文件操作中保留。A path that was previously used in the program, perhaps retained from the last directory or file operation. - 在应用程序中从永久性源（如应用程序设置、 或字符串资源）读取的路径。A path read from a persistent source, such as an application setting, a or a string resource in the application. - 标准 Windows 系统和用户路径（如程序文件、MyDocuments、MyMusic 等）（可使用 方法获取）Standard Windows system and user paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, MyMusic, and so on (which you can obtain using the method) - 与当前应用程序相关的路径，如其启动目录（可以使用 对象上的属性获取）。A path related to the current application, such as its startup directory (which you can obtain using properties on the object). 有关创建动态路径的详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information about creating dynamic paths, see the class overview. 在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]上，如果将 设置为完整文件名而不只是目录路径，则初始目录将默认为应用程序路径或用户上次从中选择文件的目录。On [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)], if is set to a full file name instead of just a directory path, the initial directory will default either to the application path, or to the directory from which the user last selected a file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 的 实现，并说明了如何创建、设置属性和显示对话框。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 当对话框向用户显示时，此示例使用 属性设置初始目录的内容。The example uses the property to set what the initial directory is when the dialog box is displayed to the user. 该示例要求在窗体上放置了一个 ，并向其添加了 命名空间。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对话框是否支持显示和保存具有多个文件扩展名的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the dialog box supports displaying and saving files that have multiple file name extensions.

value.span: 如果对话框支持多个文件扩展名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box supports multiple file name extensions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，用户必须打开并保存使用多个文件扩展名的文件。Sometimes users must open and save files that use multiple file name extensions. 例如，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 部署技术所使用的应用程序清单文件以复杂文件扩展名 ".exe" 结尾。For example, the application manifest files used by the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment technology end in the complex file name extension ".exe.manifest". 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则可以将 属性设置为多点扩展。Setting this property to `true` enables you to set the property to a multi-dotted extension. 如果 `false`，并将多点扩展分配给 ，则 的派生控件将仅使用字符串中的最后一个扩展。If is `false`, and you assign a multi-dotted extension to , derived controls such as will only use the last extension in the string. 例如，将使用 ".manifest" 而不是 ".exe"。For example, ".manifest" will be used instead of ".exe.manifest". ## Examples 下面的代码示例保存扩展名为 ".txt" 的文件。The following code example saves files with the extension ".data.txt". 此代码示例要求你的应用程序承载名为 `saveFileDialog1` 的 以及一个名为 `button1`的 。This code example requires that your application host a named `saveFileDialog1` and a named `button1`. [!code-csharp[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the file dialog box title.

value.span: 文件对话框标题。

span.span: The file dialog box title.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字符串放置在对话框的标题栏中。The string is placed in the title bar of the dialog box. 如果标题为空字符串，则系统将使用默认标题，即 "另存为" 或 "打开"。If the title is an empty string, the system uses a default title, which is either "Save As" or "Open". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 、设置 和 属性，以及允许用户通过将 属性设置为 true 来选择多个文件。The following code example demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `OpenFileDialog1` 的 的窗体中，并将一个名为 `fileButton`的 。To run this example, paste the following code in a form containing an named `OpenFileDialog1` and a named `fileButton`. 在窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeOpenFileDialog` 方法。Call the `InitializeOpenFileDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 该示例还要求 `Button` 控件的 `Click` 事件连接到本示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that the `Click` event of the `Button` control is connected to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对话框是否只接受有效的 Win32 文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box accepts only valid Win32 file names.

value.span: 如果对话框只接受有效 Win32 文件名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box accepts only valid Win32 file names; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在用户单击 **"确定**" 时编辑控件包含除空格外的任何内容，则对话框将返回文件名，无论其是否有效。If the edit control contains anything but spaces when the user clicks **OK**, the dialog box returns the file name, whether it is valid or not. 不会向文本中添加默认扩展。No default extension is added to the text.
